name: Spend
describe: Amount spent in the Channel

name: Clicks
describe: Number of ad clicks

name: Impressions
describe: Number of ad impressions

name: CTR
describe: Click-through rate

name: CPC
describe: Cost per click

name: CPM
describe: Cost per thousand impressions

name: App Engagement
describe: The number of actions, including app installs, credit spends and uses as a result of your ad.

name: App Installs
describe: The number of app installs as a result of your ad.

name: App Story Engagement
describe: The number of actions related to the application story as a result of your ad.

name: App Uses
describe: The number of uses of your app as a result of your ad. This includes number of times your app was used for a minimum of 4 minutes in the last 14 days, or at least twice by the same person with one of those times occurring in the past 14 days.

name: Gift Sales
describe: The number of gifts you sold on Facebook as result of your ad.

name: Page Likes
describe: The number of likes on your Page as a result of your ad.

name: Link Clicks
describe: The number of clicks on links appearing on your ad or Page that direct people to your sites off Facebook as a result of your ad.

name: Mobile App Installs
describe: The number of installs from a mobile device as a result of your ad.

name: Page Engagement
describe: The number of actions related to the Page and your Page's posts as a result of your ad.

name: Photo Views
describe: The number of views of your photos as a result of your ad.

name: Post Engagement
describe: The number of actions related to your Page's posts as a result of your ad.

name: Post Likes
describe: The number of likes on your Page's posts as a result of your ad.

name: Event Responses
describe: The number of people who responded going or interested in your event as a result of your ad.

name: Page Tab Views
describe: The number of views of tabs on your Page as a result of your ad.

name: App Store Clicks
describe: The numbers of clicks that go to app store after user clicks your ads.

name: Call to Action Clicks
describe: The number of clicks on the call to action button your ad receives.

name: Deeplink Clicks
describe: The numbers of clicks that go to app after user clicks your ads.

name: Inline Link Clicks
describe: The number of inline link clicks that your ad got.

name: Inline Post Engagement
describe: The number of inline post engagement that your ad got.

name: Social Clicks
describe: The number of clicks your ad receives when it's shown with social information (ex: Jane Doe likes this).

name: Social Impressions
describe: The number of times your ad was served, with social information. For example, if 3 people are served an ad 2 times each and it includes information about a friend liking your Page, it counts as 6 social impressions.

name: Total Actions
describe: The number of actions taken on your ad, Page, app or event after your ad was served to someone, even if they didn't click on it. Actions include Page likes, app installs, conversions, event responses and more. For example, 2 Page likes and 2 comments would be counted as 4 actions.

name: Website Clicks
describe: The numbers of clicks that go to web after user clicks your ads.

name: Sessions
describe: Number of Google Analytics sessions

name: Transactions
describe: Number of Google Analytics ecommerce transactions

name: Cost per transaction
describe: Spend divided by Transactions

name: CR Transactions
describe: Transactions divided by Sessions

name: Transaction assists
describe: Google Analytics ecommerce transactions, where the Channel was not the last interaction

name: Transaction revenue
describe: Total revenue from Transactions

name: Avg. order value
describe: Transaction revenue divided by Transactions

name: ROAS
describe: Return on advertising spend (Transaction revenue divided by Spend)

name: Pages / Session
describe: Google Analytics Pages / Session

name: Pageviews
describe: Google Analytics Pageviews

name: % New Sessions
describe: Google Analytics % New Sessions

name: Bounce rate
describe: Google Analytics Bounce rate

name: Avg. Session duration
describe: The average duration of user sessions in seconds

name: New users
describe: Number of new users
